name: foci-list-coords
author: Connectome Workbench Developers
description:
Output foci coordinates in a text file.

Output the coordinates for every focus in the foci file, and optionally the focus names in a second text file.

inputs.name: coord_file_out
inputs.description: output - the output coordinate text file

inputs.name: opt_names_out_names_file_out
inputs.description: output the foci names: output - text file to put foci names in
